name: Franco Raimondi
content: Franco Raimondi Franco Raimondi Gran Sasso Science Institute, 67100 L'Aquila, Italy franco.raimondi@gssi.it I am a Professor of Computer Science at the Gran Sasso Science Institute, LâAquila, Italy. Previously, I was Head of Department of Computer Science at Middlesex University, and an Amazon Scholar for Prime Video â Automated Reasoning team. In the past century I obtained my BSc+MSc in Physics from the University of Milan in Italy. PhD in CS from UCL. My new book (Italian version here) Research Interests My interests are mostly in multi-agent systems, (symbolic) AI, Software Engineering, V&V. In my research, I tend to apply logic-based methods to the formal verification of complex and critical systems. Publications You can find the list of my publications: Google Scholar DBLP Feel free to contact me if you have problems accessing them. Misc I enjoy mountains, cycling, running, and outdoors activities in general. Drop me an email if you want to join me. If you are curious, check my Strava profile.
